isPublished.name: isPublished
isPublished.summary: If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now,
isPublished.description: and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

description_parts.content: and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

doc.description:
If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now,
and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

isPublished.comments:
/**
   * If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now,
   * and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true
   *
   * @param string $id_note
   * @return boolean
   */
